name: Asthma, Measured Peak flow Today
description: goal should be Greater than 80% of personal best

name: Asthma, Hospitalizations in last 3 Months
description: If more than 2 consider step-up current therapy to next level of treatment

name: Asthma, Weekly Usage of Rescue Inhaler
shortname: How many times per week does patient utilize rescue inhaler
description: If patient using more than  2 days / week, consider step-up therapy to next level of treatment

name: Asthma, Weekly Nighttime Awakenings
shortname: Times per week does patient have nighttime awakenings secondary to shortness of breath
description: If 1-3x/ week consider step-up therapy to next level of treatment

name: Asthma, Does Patient Take Inhaler as prescribed
shortname: Does patient take inhaler as prescribed

name: Asthma, Does Patient demonstrate Proper Inhaler Technique
shortname: Does patient demonstrate proper inhaler technique
